let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let rec assoc (d,k,l) = 
  match l with  
    | [] -> d
    | h::t -> 
        let (p , q) = h in
          if k = p then q
          else assoc (d, k, t)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec wwhile (f,b) = 
  let (b' , c') = f b in
    if c' = false then b' else wwhile(f, b')

type expr = 
      VarX
    | VarY
    | Sine     of expr
    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec exprToString e = match e with
  | VarX -> "x"
  | VarY -> "y"
  | Sine(expr) -> "sin(pi*"^exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Cosine(expr) -> "cos(pi"^ exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Average(expr, expr2) -> "(("^exprToString(expr)^"+"^exprToString(expr2)^")/2)"
  | Times(expr, expr2) -> exprToString(expr)^"*"^exprToString(expr2)
  | Thresh(expr, expr2, expr3, expr4) -> "("^exprToString(expr)^"<"^exprToString(expr2)^"?"^exprToString(expr3)^":"^exprToString(expr4)^")"

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine(e) -> sin(pi *. eval(e, x, y ))
  | Cosine(e)  -> cos(pi *. eval(e, x, y))
  | Average(e1, e2) -> ((eval(e1, x , y) /. 2.0) +. (eval(e2, x ,y) /. 2.0))
  | Times(e1, e2) -> eval(e1, x, y) *. eval(e2, x ,y)
  | Thresh(e1, e2, e3, e4) -> if eval(e1, x ,y) < eval(e2, x ,y) 
      then eval(e3, x ,y) else eval(e4, x, y)

let _ = eval (sampleExpr,0.5,0.2);;



let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

    if depth = 0 then
      match rand(0,2) with
        | 0 -> buildX()
        | 1 -> buildY()
        | _ -> failwith"ruh roh"
    else

        | 2 -> buildSine(build(rand, d'))
        | 3 -> buildCosine(build(rand , d'))
        | 4 -> buildAverage(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 5 -> buildTimes(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 6 -> buildThresh(biuld(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | _ -> failwith "ruh roh2"

  let _ =

            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));

let max = ref 0

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let rec assoc (d,k,l) = 
  match l with  
    | [] -> d
    | h::t -> 
        let (p , q) = h in
          if k = p then q
          else assoc (d, k, t)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec wwhile (f,b) = 
  let (b' , c') = f b in
    if c' = false then b' else wwhile(f, b')

type expr = 
      VarX
    | VarY
    | Sine     of expr
    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec exprToString e = match e with
  | VarX -> "x"
  | VarY -> "y"
  | Sine(expr) -> "sin(pi*"^exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Cosine(expr) -> "cos(pi"^ exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Average(expr, expr2) -> "(("^exprToString(expr)^"+"^exprToString(expr2)^")/2)"
  | Times(expr, expr2) -> exprToString(expr)^"*"^exprToString(expr2)
  | Thresh(expr, expr2, expr3, expr4) -> "("^exprToString(expr)^"<"^exprToString(expr2)^"?"^exprToString(expr3)^":"^exprToString(expr4)^")"

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine(e) -> sin(pi *. eval(e, x, y ))
  | Cosine(e)  -> cos(pi *. eval(e, x, y))
  | Average(e1, e2) -> ((eval(e1, x , y) /. 2.0) +. (eval(e2, x ,y) /. 2.0))
  | Times(e1, e2) -> eval(e1, x, y) *. eval(e2, x ,y)
  | Thresh(e1, e2, e3, e4) -> if eval(e1, x ,y) < eval(e2, x ,y) 
      then eval(e3, x ,y) else eval(e4, x, y)


let _ = eval (Sine(Average(VarX,VarY)),0.5,-0.5);;
let _ = eval (Sine(Average(VarX,VarY)),0.3,0.3);;
let _ = eval (sampleExpr,0.5,0.2);;



let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let rec build (rand, depth) = 
  let d' = depth - 1 in
    if depth = 0 then
      match rand(0,2) with
        | 0 -> buildX()
        | 1 -> buildY()
        | _ -> failwith"ruh roh"
    else
      match rand(2, 7) with
        | 2 -> buildSine(build(rand, d'))
        | 3 -> buildCosine(build(rand , d'))
        | 4 -> buildAverage(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 5 -> buildTimes(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 6 -> buildThresh(biuld(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | _ -> failwith "ruh roh2"

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec wwhile (f,b) =

type expr = 
      VarX
    | VarY
    | Sine     of expr
    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec exprToString e = match e with
  | VarX -> "x"
  | VarY -> "y"
  | Sine(expr) -> "sin(pi*"^exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Cosine(expr) -> "cos(pi"^ exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Average(expr, expr2) -> "(("^exprToString(expr)^"+"^exprToString(expr2)^")/2)"
  | Times(expr, expr2) -> exprToString(expr)^"*"^exprToString(expr2)
  | Thresh(expr, expr2, expr3, expr4) -> "("^exprToString(expr)^"<"^exprToString(expr2)^"?"^exprToString(expr3)^":"^exprToString(expr4)^")"

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine(e) -> sin(pi *. eval(e, x, y ))
  | Cosine(e)  -> cos(pi *. eval(e, x, y))
  | Average(e1, e2) -> ((eval(e1, x , y) /. 2.0) +. (eval(e2, x ,y) /. 2.0))
  | Times(e1, e2) -> eval(e1, x, y) *. eval(e2, x ,y)
  | Thresh(e1, e2, e3, e4) -> if eval(e1, x ,y) < eval(e2, x ,y) 
      then eval(e3, x ,y) else eval(e4, x, y)

let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let rec build (rand, depth) = 
  let d' = depth - 1 in
    if depth = 0 then
      match rand(0,2) with
        | 0 -> buildX()
        | 1 -> buildY()
        | _ -> failwith"ruh roh"
    else
      match rand(2, 7) with
        | 2 -> buildSine(build(rand, d'))
        | 3 -> buildCosine(build(rand , d'))
        | 4 -> buildAverage(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 5 -> buildTimes(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 6 -> buildThresh(biuld(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | _ -> failwith "ruh roh2"

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in

  let _ =

          fun ix ->

                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s =

    _exp 0

          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest')

    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec exprToString e = match e with

  | VarY -> "y"
  | Sine(expr) -> "sin(pi*"^exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Cosine(expr) -> "cos(pi"^ exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Average(expr, expr2) -> "(("^exprToString(expr)^"+"^exprToString(expr2)^")/2)"
  | Times(expr, expr2) -> exprToString(expr)^"*"^exprToString(expr2)
  | Thresh(expr, expr2, expr3, expr4) -> "("^exprToString(expr)^"<"^exprToString(expr2)^"?"^exprToString(expr3)^":"^exprToString(expr4)^")"

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine(e) -> sin(pi *. eval(e, x, y ))
  | Cosine(e)  -> cos(pi *. eval(e, x, y))
  | Average(e1, e2) -> ((eval(e1, x , y) /. 2.0) +. (eval(e2, x ,y) /. 2.0))
  | Times(e1, e2) -> eval(e1, x, y) *. eval(e2, x ,y)
  | Thresh(e1, e2, e3, e4) -> if eval(e1, x ,y) < eval(e2, x ,y) 
      then eval(e3, x ,y) else eval(e4, x, y)

let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let rec build (rand, depth) = 
  let d' = depth - 1 in
    if depth = 0 then
      match rand(0,2) with
        | 0 -> buildX()
        | 1 -> buildY()
        | _ -> failwith"ruh roh"
    else
      match rand(2, 7) with
        | 2 -> buildSine(build(rand, d'))
        | 3 -> buildCosine(build(rand , d'))
        | 4 -> buildAverage(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 5 -> buildTimes(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 6 -> buildThresh(biuld(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | _ -> failwith "ruh roh2"

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))

  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n)

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in

  let e3 = build (g, depth) in

  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in

  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name)

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY

let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine(e) -> sin(pi *. eval(e, x, y ))
  | Cosine(e)  -> cos(pi *. eval(e, x, y))
  | Average(e1, e2) -> ((eval(e1, x , y) /. 2.0) +. (eval(e2, x ,y) /. 2.0))
  | Times(e1, e2) -> eval(e1, x, y) *. eval(e2, x ,y)
  | Thresh(e1, e2, e3, e4) -> if eval(e1, x ,y) < eval(e2, x ,y) 
      then eval(e3, x ,y) else eval(e4, x, y)

let _ = eval (sampleExpr,0.5,0.2);;



let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

    else
      match rand(2, 7) with
        | 2 -> buildSine(build(rand, d'))
        | 3 -> buildCosine(build(rand , d'))
        | 4 -> buildAverage(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 5 -> buildTimes(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 6 -> buildThresh(biuld(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | _ -> failwith "ruh roh2"

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n)

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

  let f = eval_fn e in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

  let e1 = build (g, depth) in

  let e3 = build (g, depth) in

  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in

  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name)

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let rec assoc (d,k,l) = 
  match l with  
    | [] -> d
    | h::t -> 
        let (p , q) = h in
          if k = p then q
          else assoc (d, k, t)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr

let rec exprToString e = match e with
  | VarX -> "x"
  | VarY -> "y"
  | Sine(expr) -> "sin(pi*"^exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Cosine(expr) -> "cos(pi"^ exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Average(expr, expr2) -> "(("^exprToString(expr)^"+"^exprToString(expr2)^")/2)"
  | Times(expr, expr2) -> exprToString(expr)^"*"^exprToString(expr2)
  | Thresh(expr, expr2, expr3, expr4) -> "("^exprToString(expr)^"<"^exprToString(expr2)^"?"^exprToString(expr3)^":"^exprToString(expr4)^")"

  | Average(e1, e2) -> ((eval(e1, x , y) /. 2.0) +. (eval(e2, x ,y) /. 2.0))
  | Times(e1, e2) -> eval(e1, x, y) *. eval(e2, x ,y)
  | Thresh(e1, e2, e3, e4) -> if eval(e1, x ,y) < eval(e2, x ,y) 
      then eval(e3, x ,y) else eval(e4, x, y)

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

  let g = makeRand(seed1,seed2) in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let e = build (g,depth) in
  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

type test = unit -> string

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =

  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

let rec assoc (d,k,l) = 
  match l with  
    | [] -> d
    | h::t -> 
        let (p , q) = h in
          if k = p then q
          else assoc (d, k, t)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec wwhile (f,b) = 
  let (b' , c') = f b in
    if c' = false then b' else wwhile(f, b')

type expr = 
      VarX
    | VarY
    | Sine     of expr
    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec exprToString e = match e with
  | VarX -> "x"
  | VarY -> "y"
  | Sine(expr) -> "sin(pi*"^exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Cosine(expr) -> "cos(pi"^ exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Average(expr, expr2) -> "(("^exprToString(expr)^"+"^exprToString(expr2)^")/2)"
  | Times(expr, expr2) -> exprToString(expr)^"*"^exprToString(expr2)
  | Thresh(expr, expr2, expr3, expr4) -> "("^exprToString(expr)^"<"^exprToString(expr2)^"?"^exprToString(expr3)^":"^exprToString(expr4)^")"






let sampleExpr1 = Thresh(VarX,VarY,VarX,(Times(Sine(VarX),Cosine(Average(VarX,VarY)))));;

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine(e) -> sin(pi *. eval(e, x, y ))
  | Cosine(e)  -> cos(pi *. eval(e, x, y))
  | Average(e1, e2) -> ((eval(e1, x , y) /. 2.0) +. (eval(e2, x ,y) /. 2.0))
  | Times(e1, e2) -> eval(e1, x, y) *. eval(e2, x ,y)
  | Thresh(e1, e2, e3, e4) -> if eval(e1, x ,y) < eval(e2, x ,y) 
      then eval(e3, x ,y) else eval(e4, x, y)


let _ = eval (Sine(Average(VarX,VarY)),0.5,-0.5);;
let _ = eval (Sine(Average(VarX,VarY)),0.3,0.3);;
let _ = eval (sampleExpr,0.5,0.2);;



let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let rec build (rand, depth) = 
  let d' = depth - 1 in
    if depth = 0 then
      match rand(0,2) with
        | 0 -> buildX()
        | 1 -> buildY()
        | _ -> failwith"ruh roh"
    else
      match rand(2, 7) with
        | 2 -> buildSine(build(rand, d'))
        | 3 -> buildCosine(build(rand , d'))
        | 4 -> buildAverage(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 5 -> buildTimes(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 6 -> buildThresh(biuld(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | _ -> failwith "ruh roh2"

exception TestException

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let rec assoc (d,k,l) = 
  match l with  
    | [] -> d
    | h::t -> 
        let (p , q) = h in
          if k = p then q
          else assoc (d, k, t)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec wwhile (f,b) = 
  let (b' , c') = f b in

type expr = 
      VarX
    | VarY
    | Sine     of expr
    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec exprToString e = match e with
  | VarX -> "x"
  | VarY -> "y"
  | Sine(expr) -> "sin(pi*"^exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Cosine(expr) -> "cos(pi"^ exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Average(expr, expr2) -> "(("^exprToString(expr)^"+"^exprToString(expr2)^")/2)"
  | Times(expr, expr2) -> exprToString(expr)^"*"^exprToString(expr2)
  | Thresh(expr, expr2, expr3, expr4) -> "("^exprToString(expr)^"<"^exprToString(expr2)^"?"^exprToString(expr3)^":"^exprToString(expr4)^")"






let sampleExpr1 = Thresh(VarX,VarY,VarX,(Times(Sine(VarX),Cosine(Average(VarX,VarY)))));;

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine(e) -> sin(pi *. eval(e, x, y ))
  | Cosine(e)  -> cos(pi *. eval(e, x, y))
  | Average(e1, e2) -> ((eval(e1, x , y) /. 2.0) +. (eval(e2, x ,y) /. 2.0))
  | Times(e1, e2) -> eval(e1, x, y) *. eval(e2, x ,y)
  | Thresh(e1, e2, e3, e4) -> if eval(e1, x ,y) < eval(e2, x ,y) 
      then eval(e3, x ,y) else eval(e4, x, y)


let _ = eval (Sine(Average(VarX,VarY)),0.5,-0.5);;
let _ = eval (Sine(Average(VarX,VarY)),0.3,0.3);;
let _ = eval (sampleExpr,0.5,0.2);;



let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let rec build (rand, depth) = 
  let d' = depth - 1 in
    if depth = 0 then
      match rand(0,2) with
        | 0 -> buildX()
        | 1 -> buildY()
        | _ -> failwith"ruh roh"
    else
      match rand(2, 7) with
        | 2 -> buildSine(build(rand, d'))
        | 3 -> buildCosine(build(rand , d'))
        | 4 -> buildAverage(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 5 -> buildTimes(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 6 -> buildThresh(biuld(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | _ -> failwith "ruh roh2"

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec wwhile (f,b) =

type expr = 
      VarX
    | VarY
    | Sine     of expr
    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec exprToString e = match e with
  | VarX -> "x"
  | VarY -> "y"
  | Sine(expr) -> "sin(pi*"^exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Cosine(expr) -> "cos(pi"^ exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Average(expr, expr2) -> "(("^exprToString(expr)^"+"^exprToString(expr2)^")/2)"
  | Times(expr, expr2) -> exprToString(expr)^"*"^exprToString(expr2)
  | Thresh(expr, expr2, expr3, expr4) -> "("^exprToString(expr)^"<"^exprToString(expr2)^"?"^exprToString(expr3)^":"^exprToString(expr4)^")"






let sampleExpr1 = Thresh(VarX,VarY,VarX,(Times(Sine(VarX),Cosine(Average(VarX,VarY)))));;

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine(e) -> sin(pi *. eval(e, x, y ))
  | Cosine(e)  -> cos(pi *. eval(e, x, y))
  | Average(e1, e2) -> ((eval(e1, x , y) /. 2.0) +. (eval(e2, x ,y) /. 2.0))
  | Times(e1, e2) -> eval(e1, x, y) *. eval(e2, x ,y)
  | Thresh(e1, e2, e3, e4) -> if eval(e1, x ,y) < eval(e2, x ,y) 
      then eval(e3, x ,y) else eval(e4, x, y)


let _ = eval (Sine(Average(VarX,VarY)),0.5,-0.5);;
let _ = eval (Sine(Average(VarX,VarY)),0.3,0.3);;
let _ = eval (sampleExpr,0.5,0.2);;



let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let rec build (rand, depth) = 
  let d' = depth - 1 in
    if depth = 0 then
      match rand(0,2) with
        | 0 -> buildX()
        | 1 -> buildY()
        | _ -> failwith"ruh roh"
    else
      match rand(2, 7) with
        | 2 -> buildSine(build(rand, d'))
        | 3 -> buildCosine(build(rand , d'))
        | 4 -> buildAverage(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 5 -> buildTimes(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 6 -> buildThresh(biuld(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | _ -> failwith "ruh roh2"

  let s = Random.State.make seed in

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n)

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

type test = unit -> string

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let rec exprToString e = match e with
  | VarX -> "x"
  | VarY -> "y"
  | Sine(expr) -> "sin(pi*"^exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Cosine(expr) -> "cos(pi"^ exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Average(expr, expr2) -> "(("^exprToString(expr)^"+"^exprToString(expr2)^")/2)"
  | Times(expr, expr2) -> exprToString(expr)^"*"^exprToString(expr2)
  | Thresh(expr, expr2, expr3, expr4) -> "("^exprToString(expr)^"<"^exprToString(expr2)^"?"^exprToString(expr3)^":"^exprToString(expr4)^")"

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY

let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine(e) -> sin(pi *. eval(e, x, y ))
  | Cosine(e)  -> cos(pi *. eval(e, x, y))
  | Average(e1, e2) -> ((eval(e1, x , y) /. 2.0) +. (eval(e2, x ,y) /. 2.0))
  | Times(e1, e2) -> eval(e1, x, y) *. eval(e2, x ,y)
  | Thresh(e1, e2, e3, e4) -> if eval(e1, x ,y) < eval(e2, x ,y) 
      then eval(e3, x ,y) else eval(e4, x, y)

let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let rec build (rand, depth) = 
  let d' = depth - 1 in
    if depth = 0 then
      match rand(0,2) with
        | 0 -> buildX()
        | 1 -> buildY()
        | _ -> failwith"ruh roh"
    else
      match rand(2, 7) with
        | 2 -> buildSine(build(rand, d'))
        | 3 -> buildCosine(build(rand , d'))
        | 4 -> buildAverage(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 5 -> buildTimes(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 6 -> buildThresh(biuld(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | _ -> failwith "ruh roh2"

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n)

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let rec assoc (d,k,l) = 
  match l with  
    | [] -> d
    | h::t -> 
        let (p , q) = h in
          if k = p then q
          else assoc (d, k, t)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine(e) -> sin(pi *. eval(e, x, y ))
  | Cosine(e)  -> cos(pi *. eval(e, x, y))
  | Average(e1, e2) -> ((eval(e1, x , y) /. 2.0) +. (eval(e2, x ,y) /. 2.0))
  | Times(e1, e2) -> eval(e1, x, y) *. eval(e2, x ,y)
  | Thresh(e1, e2, e3, e4) -> if eval(e1, x ,y) < eval(e2, x ,y) 
      then eval(e3, x ,y) else eval(e4, x, y)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

    emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let rec assoc (d,k,l) = 
  match l with  
    | [] -> d
    | h::t -> 
        let (p , q) = h in
          if k = p then q
          else assoc (d, k, t)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

type expr = 
      VarX

    | Sine     of expr
    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

let rec exprToString e = match e with
  | VarX -> "x"
  | VarY -> "y"
  | Sine(expr) -> "sin(pi*"^exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Cosine(expr) -> "cos(pi"^ exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Average(expr, expr2) -> "(("^exprToString(expr)^"+"^exprToString(expr2)^")/2)"
  | Times(expr, expr2) -> exprToString(expr)^"*"^exprToString(expr2)
  | Thresh(expr, expr2, expr3, expr4) -> "("^exprToString(expr)^"<"^exprToString(expr2)^"?"^exprToString(expr3)^":"^exprToString(expr4)^")"

let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)

let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)

let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine(e) -> sin(pi *. eval(e, x, y ))
  | Cosine(e)  -> cos(pi *. eval(e, x, y))
  | Average(e1, e2) -> ((eval(e1, x , y) /. 2.0) +. (eval(e2, x ,y) /. 2.0))
  | Times(e1, e2) -> eval(e1, x, y) *. eval(e2, x ,y)
  | Thresh(e1, e2, e3, e4) -> if eval(e1, x ,y) < eval(e2, x ,y) 
      then eval(e3, x ,y) else eval(e4, x, y)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"

let rec assoc (d,k,l) = 
  match l with  
    | [] -> d
    | h::t -> 
        let (p , q) = h in
          if k = p then q
          else assoc (d, k, t)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec wwhile (f,b) = 
  let (b' , c') = f b in
    if c' = false then b' else wwhile(f, b')

type expr = 
      VarX
    | VarY
    | Sine     of expr
    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec exprToString e = match e with
  | VarX -> "x"
  | VarY -> "y"
  | Sine(expr) -> "sin(pi*"^exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Cosine(expr) -> "cos(pi"^ exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Average(expr, expr2) -> "(("^exprToString(expr)^"+"^exprToString(expr2)^")/2)"
  | Times(expr, expr2) -> exprToString(expr)^"*"^exprToString(expr2)
  | Thresh(expr, expr2, expr3, expr4) -> "("^exprToString(expr)^"<"^exprToString(expr2)^"?"^exprToString(expr3)^":"^exprToString(expr4)^")"






let sampleExpr1 = Thresh(VarX,VarY,VarX,(Times(Sine(VarX),Cosine(Average(VarX,VarY)))));;

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine(e) -> sin(pi *. eval(e, x, y ))
  | Cosine(e)  -> cos(pi *. eval(e, x, y))
  | Average(e1, e2) -> ((eval(e1, x , y) /. 2.0) +. (eval(e2, x ,y) /. 2.0))
  | Times(e1, e2) -> eval(e1, x, y) *. eval(e2, x ,y)
  | Thresh(e1, e2, e3, e4) -> if eval(e1, x ,y) < eval(e2, x ,y) 
      then eval(e3, x ,y) else eval(e4, x, y)


let _ = eval (Sine(Average(VarX,VarY)),0.5,-0.5);;
let _ = eval (Sine(Average(VarX,VarY)),0.3,0.3);;
let _ = eval (sampleExpr,0.5,0.2);;



let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let rec build (rand, depth) = 
  let d' = depth - 1 in
    if depth = 0 then
      match rand(0,2) with
        | 0 -> buildX()
        | 1 -> buildY()
        | _ -> failwith"ruh roh"
    else
      match rand(2, 7) with
        | 2 -> buildSine(build(rand, d'))
        | 3 -> buildCosine(build(rand , d'))
        | 4 -> buildAverage(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 5 -> buildTimes(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 6 -> buildThresh(biuld(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | _ -> failwith "ruh roh2"

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s =

    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let rec assoc (d,k,l) = 
  match l with  
    | [] -> d
    | h::t -> 
        let (p , q) = h in
          if k = p then q
          else assoc (d, k, t)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec wwhile (f,b) = 
  let (b' , c') = f b in
    if c' = false then b' else wwhile(f, b')

type expr = 
      VarX
    | VarY
    | Sine     of expr
    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec exprToString e = match e with
  | VarX -> "x"
  | VarY -> "y"
  | Sine(expr) -> "sin(pi*"^exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Cosine(expr) -> "cos(pi"^ exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Average(expr, expr2) -> "(("^exprToString(expr)^"+"^exprToString(expr2)^")/2)"
  | Times(expr, expr2) -> exprToString(expr)^"*"^exprToString(expr2)
  | Thresh(expr, expr2, expr3, expr4) -> "("^exprToString(expr)^"<"^exprToString(expr2)^"?"^exprToString(expr3)^":"^exprToString(expr4)^")"






let sampleExpr1 = Thresh(VarX,VarY,VarX,(Times(Sine(VarX),Cosine(Average(VarX,VarY)))));;

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine(e) -> sin(pi *. eval(e, x, y ))
  | Cosine(e)  -> cos(pi *. eval(e, x, y))
  | Average(e1, e2) -> ((eval(e1, x , y) /. 2.0) +. (eval(e2, x ,y) /. 2.0))
  | Times(e1, e2) -> eval(e1, x, y) *. eval(e2, x ,y)
  | Thresh(e1, e2, e3, e4) -> if eval(e1, x ,y) < eval(e2, x ,y) 
      then eval(e3, x ,y) else eval(e4, x, y)


let _ = eval (Sine(Average(VarX,VarY)),0.5,-0.5);;
let _ = eval (Sine(Average(VarX,VarY)),0.3,0.3);;
let _ = eval (sampleExpr,0.5,0.2);;



let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let rec build (rand, depth) = 
  let d' = depth - 1 in
    if depth = 0 then
      match rand(0,2) with
        | 0 -> buildX()
        | 1 -> buildY()
        | _ -> failwith"ruh roh"
    else
      match rand(2, 7) with
        | 2 -> buildSine(build(rand, d'))
        | 3 -> buildCosine(build(rand , d'))
        | 4 -> buildAverage(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 5 -> buildTimes(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 6 -> buildThresh(biuld(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | _ -> failwith "ruh roh2"

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))


(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

    emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

let rec assoc (d,k,l) = 
  match l with  
    | [] -> d
    | h::t -> 
        let (p , q) = h in
          if k = p then q
          else assoc (d, k, t)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

  let (b' , c') = f b in

let rec exprToString e = match e with
  | VarX -> "x"
  | VarY -> "y"
  | Sine(expr) -> "sin(pi*"^exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Cosine(expr) -> "cos(pi"^ exprToString(expr)^")"
  | Average(expr, expr2) -> "(("^exprToString(expr)^"+"^exprToString(expr2)^")/2)"
  | Times(expr, expr2) -> exprToString(expr)^"*"^exprToString(expr2)
  | Thresh(expr, expr2, expr3, expr4) -> "("^exprToString(expr)^"<"^exprToString(expr2)^"?"^exprToString(expr3)^":"^exprToString(expr4)^")"

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine(e) -> sin(pi *. eval(e, x, y ))
  | Cosine(e)  -> cos(pi *. eval(e, x, y))
  | Average(e1, e2) -> ((eval(e1, x , y) /. 2.0) +. (eval(e2, x ,y) /. 2.0))
  | Times(e1, e2) -> eval(e1, x, y) *. eval(e2, x ,y)
  | Thresh(e1, e2, e3, e4) -> if eval(e1, x ,y) < eval(e2, x ,y) 
      then eval(e3, x ,y) else eval(e4, x, y)

let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let rec build (rand, depth) = 
  let d' = depth - 1 in
    if depth = 0 then
      match rand(0,2) with
        | 0 -> buildX()
        | 1 -> buildY()
        | _ -> failwith"ruh roh"
    else
      match rand(2, 7) with
        | 2 -> buildSine(build(rand, d'))
        | 3 -> buildCosine(build(rand , d'))
        | 4 -> buildAverage(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 5 -> buildTimes(build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | 6 -> buildThresh(biuld(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'), build(rand, d'))
        | _ -> failwith "ruh roh2"

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n)

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)
